descriptionlist.description:
This package depends Alderis package from Chariz: https://chariz.com/

Add customizable pasteboard shortcuts to your iPad keyboard! If you own an iPhone, check out DockX.

Supporting iPadOS (13.0+). Compatible with CopyLog.

Available shortcuts:
-Select All
-Copy
-Paste
-Cut
-Undo
-Redo
-Beginning of Document
-Ending of Document
-Capitalize
-Lowercase
-Uppercase
-Delete
-Bold
-Italic
-Underline
-Cursor Left
-Cursor Right
-Cursor Up
-Cursor Down
-Dismiss Keyboard
-Auto-Correction
-Auto-Capitalization
-Keyboard Input Type (NumPad, PhonePad etc)
-Define Word
-Shell Command
and many more long press gesture on the shortcuts

Go to setting page to manage your shortcuts.

To support development: https://www.paypal.me/udevs
